Label: PTK2B
Comment: IL-7 stimulation induces the phosphorylation of PTK2B in human chondrocytes.

Label: STAT5A
Comment: IL-7 stimulation induces phosphorylation and nuclear transport of STAT5A in human peripheral blood T lymphoblasts.

Label: STAT5B
Comment: IL-7 stimulation leads to phosphorylation of STAT5B in CD8 T cells and human peripheral blood T lymphoblasts respectively.

Label: JAK1
Comment: IL-7 stimulation induces tyrosine phosphorylation of the kinase JAK1 in human thymocytes

Label: IL7R
Comment: The common gamma chain augments IL-7 binding affinity and internalization of IL-7, which may explain the defects in X-linked severe combined immunodeficiency.

Label: STAT3
Comment: IL7 stimulation induces increased phosphorylation of STAT3 in normal human chondrocytes and T lymphoblasts.

Label: JAK3
Comment: IL7 stimulation induces increased phosphorylation of JAK3 in normal human chondrocytes and thymocytes.

Label: STAT1
Comment: IL-7 stimulation leads to tyrosine phosphorylation of STAT1 in human CD4 T cells and murine YT-5 cells
